description: A whole chicken in a soup with ginseng, rice, and herbal additions, perfect for summer.

step_by_step: 1. Wash your rice and leave to soak for an hour. 2. Pop all your samgyetang roots, twigs and dried fruit into a large spice bag. 3. Pop the bag into a large pan and cover with water. 4. Stuff the chicken with whole garlic cloves and some rice. 5. Seal the legs of the chicken. 6. Pop the chickens into the liquid and poach for 90 minutes. 7. Make your dipping sauce. 8. Remove each chicken and discard the spice bag. 9. Serve hot with the dipping sauce.
